text.name: loadingText
text.string:
Feeding Frenzy is unable to detect either the MP3 audio
 codec or the ADPCM codec. These codecs are required for
 playing the in-game music and many sound effects. This
 problem may occur if you do not have the codec installed
 on your system, or if it has been manually disabled.

 The game will contine with certain game sounds 
and music disabled
